'''Yumemiru "Saikyo" Fortune Slip Hanger''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Yumemiru "Saikyo" Fortune Slip Hanger is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest west of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Autake Plains]] on Tsurumi Island.
<gallery>
Item Yumemiru Saikyo Fortune Slip Hanger Location.png|Map location
Item Yumemiru Saikyo Fortune Slip Hanger Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
